original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical implementation, blending strong analytical skills with exceptional communication abilities. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for deeply understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations that drive operational efficiency and support our growth. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, identify improvement opportunities, and implement robust technical solutions will be essential to the success of this position.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them clearly using techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java and SQL to enhance your technical capabilities
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles to leverage these technologies for developing solutions

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing ML and AI solutions to drive business improvements
- Track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies to collaborate effectively in a fast-paced, iterative environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, which would provide valuable context for this role

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and cross-functional team environment, with frequent interaction with business stakeholders and technical teams
- Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects, while also contributing to team-based initiatives
- Adaptability to changing priorities and a willingness to learn new technologies and processes as needed

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, technical proficiency, and exceptional communication skills. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for deeply understanding complex business processes, identifying opportunities for improvement, and translating these insights into effective system configurations that drive operational efficiency and support our organization's growth. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, leverage data-driven insights, and implement robust technical solutions will be essential to the success of this position.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using techniques such as user stories and process flows, and ensure clear understanding of their needs
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, using tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data to uncover valuable insights
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to engage effectively with stakeholders from various departments
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong data analysis skills, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL to enhance your technical capabilities and understanding of the underlying systems
- Knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles to explore opportunities for leveraging these technologies in developing solutions

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing ML and AI solutions to drive measurable business improvements
- Extensive experience in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, with a demonstrated ability to ensure their efficient operation

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in fast-paced, iterative environments
- Understanding of vehicle configuration processes and systems, which would provide valuable context and domain expertise for this role

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting software
- Agile project management platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative and cross-functional team environment, with frequent interaction with business stakeholders and technical teams
- Ability to work independently, take ownership of projects, and contribute to team-based initiatives
- Adaptability to changing priorities and a willingness to continuously learn new technologies and methodologies as needed

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic blend of business acumen and technical expertise, where you will serve as a critical link between our organization's operational needs and the underlying system configurations that support them. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for deeply understanding complex business processes, identifying opportunities for improvement, and translating these insights into effective system configurations that drive operational efficiency and support our organization's growth. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, leverage data-driven insights, and implement robust technical solutions will be essential to the success of this position.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using techniques such as user stories and process flows, and ensure a clear understanding of their needs
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, using tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data to uncover valuable insights that inform your decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to engage effectively with stakeholders from various departments
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong data analysis skills, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL to enhance your technical capabilities and understanding of the underlying systems

Preferred Skills:
- Knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles to explore opportunities for leveraging these technologies in developing solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in fast-paced, iterative environments

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing ML and AI solutions to drive measurable business improvements
- Extensive experience in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, with a demonstrated ability to ensure their efficient operation

Preferred Experience:
- Understanding of vehicle configuration processes and systems, which would provide valuable context and domain expertise for this role
- Experience working in a collaborative, cross-functional environment and contributing to team-based initiatives

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting software
- Agile project management platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative and cross-functional team environment, with frequent interaction with business stakeholders and technical teams
- Ability to work independently, take ownership of projects, and contribute to team-based initiatives
- Adaptability to changing priorities and a willingness to continuously learn new technologies and methodologies as needed
- Proactive approach to identifying and implementing process improvements, leveraging data-driven insights to drive organizational efficiency
